document.full_text: germany announced sunday it will not send a team to next week's world figure skating championships in tokyo, and international skating officials were weighing whether to even hold the event following the earthquake and tsunami that ravaged the country.
document.title: skating officials now considering canceling worlds
lines_and_colors: germany announced sunday it will not send a team to next week's world figure skating championships in tokyo, and international skating officials were weighing whether to even hold the event following the earthquake and tsunami that ravaged the country.
